Title: Ice-Watch Ice-Flashy acid yellow 43mm dial SS.NYW.U.S.12
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ice-Watch Ice-Flashy acid yellow 43mm dial SS.NYW.U.S.12 RRP £75.00 Now £37.50 Description Designed by Ice, this bright watch comes in a fun acid yellow colour, and is available in a smaller size of 38mm. The silicone strap is flexible and easily adjustable on your wrist, making this watch one of the most comfortable you will ever own. The 43mm dial is round and clear, thanks to the white numbers and dots against the acid yellow background. Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
